Plot: A novel about a helpless orphan girl who discovers the real meaning of the holy Quran which helps her cope with the vagaries of her miserable life. It appeared March-August 2011 in Khawateen Digest
Characters: Mehmal Ibrahim, Farishtey Ibrahim, Musarat Ibrahim, Humayun, Taimoor, Fawad Karim, Mehtaab Karim, Aagha Karim,
